custom-action.name: getnodelist
custom-action.description:
Get the list of Nodes Available in the network .
Possible parameters are: - TestID (required): Master Node of your Whiteblock Network Default value is "The ID of the target test". - Service (optional): Only get nodes which are of a certain service type Default value is "Only get nodes which are of a certain service type". - AccessToken (required): You can get this by running the command genesis auth print-access-token Default value is "A Whiteblock Genesis access token". - ProxyName (optional): name of the neoload proxy Default value is "name of the neoload proxy". - TraceMode (optional): enable loggin details : true: enable ; false : Disable Default value is "enable logging ".
